tere-verde.description: Terê Verde is a website developed to highlight the natural attractions and ecotourism opportunities in Teresópolis - RJ. Unlike the city’s official platform, which suffers from poor design, slow navigation, and a lack of accessibility, our solution offers a clean, responsive interface with intuitive filters and fast performance, making it easy for any visitor to explore the region’s biodiversity with just a few clicks.

orange-hub.description: Our challenge was to build a website to showcase the Orange's Experience HUB in Petrópolis - RJ. The platform allows users to schedule visits, explore materials about the HUB, learn more about Orange’s products and even generate a personalized report highlighting the services that caught their attention, helping Orange follow up with targeted and relevant information.
